name: Stick Spartans
description: Stick Spartans brings fast paced family friendly action to the living room where players poke other Spartans to eliminate them until only one remains.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD E1-6010 APU (1.35 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) R2 Graphics Storage: 40 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: 1080x1920 (16:9) monitor for optimal UI scaling
